patthana1.7:9.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:9.2: savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.7:9.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.7:10.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:11.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:12.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro ca avitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:12.2: savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana1.7:12.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #4
patthana1.7:13.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto ca avitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:13.2: savitakkasavicāre khandhe paṭicca vitakko cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana1.7:13.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicāre khandhe paṭicca vitakko kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #5
patthana1.7:14.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro ca avitakkavicāramatto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:14.2: savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā vitakko ca … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā vitakko ca.
patthana1.7:14.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā vitakko ca … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā vitakko ca. #6
patthana1.7:15.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro ca avitakkavicāramatto ca avitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:15.2: savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā vitakko ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā vitakko ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana1.7:15.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā vitakko ca kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā vitakko ca kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #7

patthana1.7:16.2: avitakkavicāramattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.7:16.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkavicāramattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.7:17.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:18.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:18.2: avitakkavicāramatte khandhe paṭicca vicāro cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana1.7:18.4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkavicāramatte khandhe paṭicca vicāro kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ.
patthana1.7:19.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro ca avitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:19.2: vitakkaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicārā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana1.7:19.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vitakkaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicārā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #4

patthana1.7:20.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkavicāramattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā vicāro ca kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā vicāro ca kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. #5
patthana1.7:21.1: Avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:21.2: avitakkaavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana1.7:21.6: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkaavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ.
patthana1.7:21.9: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vicāraṃ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, vicāraṃ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca vicāro.
patthana1.7:21.10: Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.7:21.12: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1
patthana1.7:22.1: Avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:23.1: Avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:24.1: Avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro ca avitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:25.1: Avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto ca avitakkaavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:25.2: vicāraṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramattā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana1.7:25.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vicāraṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramattā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ.
patthana1.7:25.8: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramattā khandhā ca vicāro ca. #5
patthana1.7:26.1: Avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro ca avitakkavicāramatto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:26.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicārā khandhā ca vitakko ca. #6

patthana1.7:31.2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā;
patthana1.7:31.5: savitakkasavicāre khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. #4

patthana1.7:279.1: Avitakkavicāramattañca avitakkaavicārañca dhammaṃ paccayā avitakkavicāramatto dhammo … pe …
patthana1.7:279.3: avitakkavicāramatte khandhe ca vicārañca paccayā avitakkavicāramattā cetanā.
patthana1.7:279.4: Avitakkavicāramatte khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā avitakkavicāramattā cetanā. #2
patthana1.7:280.1: Savitakkasavicārañca avitakkavicāramattañca dhammaṃ paccayā savitakkasavicāro dhammo … pe …
patthana1.7:280.3: savitakkasavicāre khandhe ca vitakkañca paccayā savitakkasavicārā cetanā. #1
patthana1.7:281.1: Savitakkasavicārañca avitakkavicāramattañca avitakkaavicārañca dhammaṃ paccayā savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.7:281.2: savitakkasavicāre khandhe ca vitakkañca vatthuñca paccayā savitakkasavicārā cetanā. #1
patthana1.7:282.1: (Navipāke sattatiṃsa pañhā kātabbā. Naāhāra naindriya najhānanamagga nasampayutta navippayutta nonatthi novigatapaccayā vitthāretabbā.)
patthana1.7:285.1: Nahetuyā tettiṃsa, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā sattatiṃsa, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye satta, napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane sattatiṃsa, nakamme ekādasa, navipāke sattatiṃsa, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge tettiṃsa, nasampayutte satta, navippayutte ekādasa, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.7:287.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta … pe … novigate satta.
patthana1.7:290.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe anantare samanantare cuddasa, sahajāte tettiṃsa, aññamaññe bāvīsa, nissaye tettiṃsa, upanissaye purejāte cuddasa, āsevane terasa, kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne tettiṃsa, magge pañca, sampayutte cuddasa, vippayutte atthiyā tettiṃsa … pe … avigate tettiṃsa.
patthana1.7:297.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:297.2: savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.7:298.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho avitakkavicāramatto dhammo … pe …
patthana1.7:299.1: Savitakkasavicāraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho savitakkasavicāro ca avitakkavicāramatto ca dhammā … pe …
patthana1.7:299.3: savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā vitakko ca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana1.7:300.2: avitakkavicāramattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana1.7:302.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho avitakkaavicāro dhammo … pe …

patthana1.7:303.3: avitakkavicāramattaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā vicāro ca … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana1.7:305.1: Avitakkaavicāraṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho avitakkavicāramatto dhammo … pe …
patthana1.7:306.1: Avitakkavicāramattañca avitakkaavicārañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho avitakkavicāramatto dhammo … pe …
patthana1.7:306.3: avitakkavicāramattaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vicārañca saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.7:307.1: Savitakkasavicārañca avitakkavicāramattañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.7:307.2: savitakkasavicāraṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vitakkañca saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe ca vitakkañca … pe …
patthana1.7:310.1: Hetuyā ekādasa, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sabbattha ekādasa.
patthana1.7:314.1: Nahetuyā cha, naadhipatiyā ekādasa, napurejāte ekādasa, napacchājāte ekādasa, naāsevane ekādasa, nakamme satta, navipāke ekādasa, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge cha, navippayutte ekādasa.
patthana1.7:318.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā ekādasa … pe … navippayutte ekādasa.
patthana1.7:321.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cha … pe … purejāte cha, āsevane pañca, kamme cha … pe … jhāne cha, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana1.7:329.1: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.7:329.2: savitakkasavicārā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:330.1: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo avitakkavicāramattassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.7:331.1: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo avitakkaavicārassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.7:331.2: savitakkasavicārā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:331.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicārā hetū kaṭattārūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana1.7:332.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicārā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #4

patthana1.7:333.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe savitakkasavicārā hetū vitakkassa kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #5

patthana1.7:336.2: avitakkavicāramattā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:336.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkavicāramattā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana1.7:339.2: avitakkaavicārā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:339.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe avitakkaavicārā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.7:341.1: Savitakkasavicāro dhammo savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.7:341.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati;
patthana1.7:341.4: savitakkasavicārā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṃ paccavekkhati.
patthana1.7:341.5: Ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.7:341.6: Savitakkasavicāre khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.7:341.7: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.

patthana1.7:348.6: Avitakkavicāramatte khandhe ca vitakkañca ārabbha savitakkasavicārā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. #4
patthana1.7:349.1: Avitakkaavicāro dhammo avitakkaavicārassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.7:349.2: nibbānaṃ avitakkaavicārassa maggassa phalassa vicārassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:349.3: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena avitakkaavicāracittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti.
patthana1.7:349.10: Avitakkaavicārā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:349.11: Avitakkaavicāre khandhe ca vicārañca ārabbha avitakkaavicārā khandhā uppajjanti. #1
patthana1.7:350.1: Avitakkaavicāro dhammo savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.7:350.2: ariyā avitakkaavicārā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṃ paccavekkhanti;
patthana1.7:350.4: Ariyā nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa vodānassa savitakkasavicārassa maggassa phalassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:350.5: Cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.7:350.6: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.7:350.19: avitakkaavicāre khandhe ca vicārañca aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.7:350.20: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.7:350.23: Avitakkaavicāre khandhe ca vicārañca ārabbha savitakkasavicārā khandhā uppajjanti. #2

patthana1.7:351.4: Ariyā nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ avitakkavicāramattassa maggassa phalassa vitakkassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.7:351.8: avitakkaavicāre khandhe ca vicārañca aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assādeti abhinandati;

patthana1.7:353.2: ariyā avitakkaavicārā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṃ paccavekkhanti;
